date: "February 11, 2016"
output: html_document
---

Three common classes of surprises in R  
1. Unstable types - not knowning what type of element something will return  
2. Non-standard evaluation: a function will return a different value based on the argument type supplied  
3. hidden arguments, stringAsFactor example
